endpoints.description: Retrieve the list of current fashion trends by demographic or region.
Get detailed information about specific apparel styles, including popularity metrics.
Access insights into fabric preferences for different consumer groups.
Fetch data on trending color choices across various demographics.
Submit consumer feedback concerning apparel preferences for analysis.
Retrieve categorized insights tied to specific demographic groups.
Obtain aggregated consumer apparel preferences by region or season.
Explore trends in textile patterns and designs.
Request detailed and customized reports enriched with consumer apparel insights.
Analyze past trends for predicting future fashion tendencies.
